channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Toronto Raptors player Jontay Porter pleads guilty to illegal betting
item.description: The NBA said Porter placed more than a dozen bets on basketball games.

item.title: Kroger and Albertsons reveal list of grocery stores at risk of sale under merger
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: How SailGP is revolutionizing water sports competition
item.description: SailGP, known as "Formula One on the water," is bringing adrenaline and innovation to the sport with $5 million boats and global races. This weekend, the season finale in San Francisco will see teams vying for a $2 million prize. "CBS Mornings" co-host Nate Burleson got a preview.

item.title: Alec Baldwin 'Rust' trial: Actor's culpability disputed in opening statements
item.description: Opening statements were delivered Wednesday in New Mexico in Alec Baldwin's manslaughter trial over the 2021 fatal shooting of a crew member on the set of "Rust."

item.title: Palm Desert residents cry foul as developer builds ‘a mountain behind us’
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Amputee lion makes record-breaking swim across croc-infested waters
item.description: Jacob has been dubbed "Africa's most resilient lion" as he continues to survive the unthinkable: "Really is a cat with nine lives."

item.title: High-ranking MS-13 gang member pleads guilty to 8 murders, including teen girls
item.description: Alexi Saenz, a high-ranking member of MS-13, pleaded guilty Wednesday to eight murders.

item.title: Jim Jordan worries dozens of members may leave en masse over House Freedom Caucus civil war
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Investing in 1-ounce gold bars this July? Here's how to buy them.
item.description: Investing in 1-ounce gold bars could be a smart move this month, but the purchasing process can be tricky.

item.title: San Antonio police fatally shoot a burglary suspect following a standoff
item.description: Police say a burglary suspect was killed in an exchange of gunfire with SWAT team officers following a standoff at a house in San Antonio

item.title: Clarence Thomas Took Free Yacht Trip to Russia, Chopper Flight to Putin’s Hometown: Dems
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule: A summer of crime time double features
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: George Clooney says president should step aside in 2024 election
item.description: Actor George Clooney called for the president to exit the 2024 race in a New York Times op-ed published Wednesday.

item.title: I can't wait for all of the media coverage of Trump's confusing Tuesday night rally
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: New Buckingham Palace tour sells out in a day
item.description: For the first time, the British Royal family has opened up the East Wing of Buckingham Palace in London to tours — but as CBS News' Leah Mishkin reports, you'll have to wait, and it won't be cheap.
